item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description: Fall 2021 10/5/21 - “Graphical Models and Logical Abstractions for Quantum Systems, Yipeng Huang (Rutgers), @yipenghuang0302, recording 10/12/21 - “Electronic Design Automation and Network Security, Riadul Islam (UMBC), recording 10/19/21 - “Managing Memory Smartly”, Jason Lowe-Power (UC Davis), @jlowepower, talk details, recording 10/26/21 - “Chisel 3.5”, Jack Koenig (SiFive), @jackakattack 11/9/21 - TBD (In-Memory computing), Siddarth Joshi (Notre Dame) Spring 2021 4/20/21 - Streamblocks : A Heterogeneous Dataflow Compiler, Bezati Endri (EPFL), recording

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2021 Chandranil Chakrabortti, Heiner Litz, Reducing write amplification in flash by death-time prediction of logical block addresses. SYSTOR, 11:1-11:12, 2021. Saeed Kargar, Heiner Litz, Faisal Nawab, Predict and Write: Using K-Means Clustering to Extend the Lifetime of NVM Storage. ICDE, 768-779, 2021. Tanvir Ahmed Khan, Dexin Zhang, Akshitha Sriraman, Joseph Devietti, Gilles Pokam, Heiner Litz, Baris Kasikci, Ripple: Profile-Guided Instruction Cache Replacement for Data Center Applications.
